  <title>Neighborhoods</title>
  <abstract>Abstract:
This data layer of Philadelphia neighborhoods was created and devised by the Community Planning Division of Philadelphia City Planning Commission.
These are general boundaries that historically have been in place around the city. They fall along the lines of development patterns, historic references and known names. They do not follow RCO boundaries and often do not align with community groups. They should not be interpreted as "official" boundaries in any way.
